definition.value: Success: You have modified Parcelforce 48 shipping!

Parcelforce 48 Rates:
Enter values upto 5,2 decimal places. (12345.67) Example: .1:1,.25:1.27 - Weights less than or equal to 0.1Kg would cost 1.00, Weights less than or equal to 0.25g but more than 0.1Kg will cost 1.27. Do not enter KG or symbols.

Display Delivery Weight:
Do you want to display the shipping weight? (e.g. Delivery Weight : 2.7674 Kg's)

Display Insurance:
Do you want to display the shipping insurance? (e.g. Insured upto 500)

Display Delivery Time:
Do you want to display the shipping time? (e.g. Ships within 3 to 5 days)

Parcelforce48 Compensation Rates:
Enter values upto 5,2 decimal places. (12345.67) Example: 34:0,100:1,250:2.25 - Insurance cover for cart values upto 34 would cost 0.00 extra, those values more than 100 and upto 250 will cost 2.25 extra. Do not enter currency symbols.

Auto Select:
You can set to skip shipping selection page if there is only one shipping option. This shipping method will be selected automatically

Accept these payments:
If only specific payment methods are needed for this shipping method, select them here. If nothing selected, all available payment methods will be shown
Warning: You do not have permission to modify Parcelforce 48 shipping!
